name: Vampiric Tower 2
description:
After 18 years (19 now that I've finally gotten around to releasing it), Victoria is back! Turn into a bat, freeze critters with ice spells, and break your brain with the completely ridiculous warp spell in the long-awaited sequel to Vampiric Tower!

Was anyone actually waiting for a sequel? You were, of course!

18 worlds with 15 rooms each, plus 3 secret worlds and 1 super secret world. That's a lot of levels! You're going to die a lot, but you have infinite lives, so no complaining!

(Press the R key to restart. You're going to need it.)

The game uses SDL2 and OpenGL 3.3 (Core Profile). As long as your video card supports that (and it probably does), you should be good to go!
